definitions.definition: Of a whitish grey colour, like that of the metal.
Of a musical recording that has sold over one million copies (for singles), or two million (for albums).
Very expensive, or of very high quality
examples: We can offer the platinum service for fifty dollars extra.

main_definition: Of a whitish grey colour, like that of the metal.
secondary_definitions: Of a musical recording that has sold over one million copies (for singles), or two million (for albums).
Very expensive, or of very high quality
